resources.string: Completed on campus studies and currently taking distance education courses to complete a masters\'s degree in computer science ( available for full-time , W-2 employment)\n

Motivated software developer with more than 6+ years of hands-on, professional experience in the full-stack design and development of software solutions, using all phases of the Software Development Life Cycle. Skills cover a variety of languages and technologies such as Java, Angular 2+, Spring Framework, Oracle PL/SQL. Have MS and BS in Math and Computer science.

Languages: C#, .NET Framework, .NET Core,Java 8, VB.NET,C++ 98/11 STL, Win32 API
 Web Development: ReactJS, Vue.JS, NodeJs, ASP.NET MVC, HTML5, CSS3, Bootstrap, JavaScript (ES6), TypeScript, RESTful API, GraphQL.
 Databases/ORM: Entity Framework/(LINQ), MS SQL, T-SQL, LLBLGen 2.4 (ORM), Redis, MongoDb
 Reports: Crystal Reports, SSRS
 Design Patterns/System Design: Strategy, Template, Observer, Composite, Iterator, Command, COR, State, Abstract Factory, CQRS, Domain Driven Design, Microservice Architecture. SDLC: Agile, Waterfall
 Testing: xUnit, Basic knowledge of Selenium and Jest.
 CI/CD, Version Control: AzureDevOps, Docker, Git Action, Git, TFS
 Tools: VS1998-2022, VSCode, Eclipse IDE, Draw.IO, StarUML, Postman, Putty, SSH, FileZilla, Postman.
 Platforms: Windows, Linux, macOs
